title: Wrapping Up
description: Do you love the Mitchell family series? Spend the holidays with all of your favs in this Holiday Novella featuring POV's from all four main characters in the series.This 200 page Novella features Thanksgiving hosted by Colt and Savanna and Christmas hosted by Ty and Miranda.There is even a few Conner parts leading to book five in the series, Wanting More.This book is intended to be a companion with the other books in the series. It is not a stand alone book and should only be read after books 1-4.*Contains adult content and sexual situations
author: Jennifer Foor
